meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of leukoplakia.
meanings.sent1: The leukoplakic patches on the tongue were concerning to the dentist.
meanings.sent2: Her leukoplakic lesions were identified during a routine oral examination.
meanings.sent3: The party guests joked that his leukoplakic smile was glowing in the dark.
meanings.sent4: The old house had a leukoplakic facade, peeling and weathered.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a vivid picture of the leukoplakic landscape, stark and white.

meanings.definition: Having the appearance or characteristics of leukoplakia.
meanings.sent1: The leukoplakic spots on the skin were worrisome.
meanings.sent2: The doctor noted the leukoplakic texture of the lesion.
meanings.sent3: The cat's leukoplakic fur made it stand out among the others.
meanings.sent4: The road was covered in a leukoplakic layer of frost, glistening in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the smell of bleach, a leukoplakic scent that lingered.
